##

$$ (sqrt(3) x)/y { a+b \brace c+d \brace e+f }
$$

$$ \root n \of {1+x+x^2+x^3+\dots+x^n}
 $$

$$ \sqrt[n]{1+x+x^2+x^3+\dots+x^n} $$

$$ 
f(x) = a{\color{red}{x}} + b
$$

$$

\min\limits_{n}

\lim\limits_{n\to \infty}

\sum\limits_{x = 0}^k{x^2}

\int_{\color{yellow}{-\infty}} ^c x^2  \mathrm{d} x

$$


$$

∫_{-∞}^{c} x^2/y dx
